titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Art Gallery and Yale Center for British Art Recordings of Lectures and Presentations
Yale Art Gallery and Yale Center for British Art Recordings of Lectures and Presentations
titlestmt.author: compiled by Mary Caldera and Abrar Rahman

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:40

did.unittitle: Yale University Art Gallery and the Yale Center for British Art, recordings of lectures and presentations

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of audio and video recordings of lectures, presentations and symposia held at the Yale Art Gallery and the Yale Center for British Art.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 33-B (YRG 33-B), Records of the Yale Art Gallery.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy for their personal use should consult Copying Services information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale University Art Gallery and the Yale Center for British Art Recordings of Lectures and Presentations (RU 359). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of audio and video recordings of lectures, presentations and symposia held at the Yale Art Gallery and the Yale Center for British Art.

did.unittitle: Audio and video tapes of lectures and presentations at the Yale Art Gallery and the Center for British Art

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The recordings are arranged by format in two sections: Audiocassettes and Video tapes. Some presentations are available in both formats and are therefore listed in both sections.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Original audio and videorecordings, as well as preservation masters and duplicating masters may not be played. Readers may only play use copies. If a use copy of a particular recording does not exist, researchers must consult with the reference archivist for policies and procedures regarding the creation of duplicating master and use copies of original recordings.
